processed.title: Greenland and Denmark reject US pressure ahead of Washington trip - Financial Times
processed.summary: Greenland and Denmark have rejected US pressure regarding territorial interests ahead of diplomatic meetings in Washington.
processed.why: This signals potential strain in US-Denmark relations and highlights renewed geopolitical tensions over Arctic territories.

processed.title: Yoon Suk Yeol: S Korea prosecutors seek death penalty over failed insurrection attempt - BBC
processed.summary: South Korean prosecutors are seeking the death penalty for former President Yoon Suk Yeol over his failed martial law declaration.
processed.why: This represents an unprecedented legal action against a sitting South Korean president and could reshape the country's political landscape.

processed.title: Apple turns to Google to power AI upgrade for Siri - BBC
processed.summary: Apple is partnering with Google to integrate AI capabilities into Siri as part of its artificial intelligence upgrade strategy.
processed.why: This collaboration between tech rivals signals a major shift in Apple's AI approach and could significantly impact the competitive landscape of AI assistants.
